channel.title: Comments on: M.A.B – Mozilla Amazon Browser
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: Well, people read it - I am sure. I red it. Yet most of the stuff is professional, which is bringing only few readers to comment. I am sure that if this will go on - you will get more profesioanls. The question are: do you want to get comments? which ones?
item.content:encoded: Well, people read it – I am sure. I red it. Yet most of the stuff is professional, which is bringing only few readers to comment. I am sure that if this will go on – you will get more profesioanls. The question are: do you want to get comments? which ones?

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Actually, you're the second person that tells me I should go back to personal-type stories. I doubt I'll submit such posts in the near future.
item.content:encoded: Actually, you’re the second person that tells me I should go back to personal-type stories. I doubt I’ll submit such posts in the near future.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: Have you noticed that I am the only one leaving comments in the past few weeks? You got to, once again, post some stories about drugs or IDF if you want to intimidate your readers ;-)
item.content:encoded: Have you noticed that I am the only one leaving comments in the past few weeks? You got to, once again, post some stories about drugs or IDF if you want to intimidate your readers ;-)

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description:
Seems that this engine can be useful, however this specific application is a poor example - it removes Amazon'e interface which is actually nice.
(Yes, I switched to Linux in order to test this thing)
item.content:encoded:
Seems that this engine can be useful, however this specific application is a poor example – it removes Amazon’e interface which is actually nice.

(Yes, I switched to Linux in order to test this thing)
